metamodel.description:
Check this to generate portal models on leading frameworks.
This Portal Metamodel allows to model Application Object structure and persistence.
SIDE provides the modeler to graphically produce class models and various generators to instantiate these models on leading frameworks.
metamodel.name: KSR200 Portal

technology.description:
Check this to generate your class models on the Alfresco product line.
Alfresco is the leading open source ECM solution.
SIDE allows to optimize the configuration of the Alfresco content model, views, forms and reports.
technology.name: Alfresco

technologyVersion.description:
Check this to generate class models on the major release 3 of Alfresco.
Alfresco 3.x is the leading open source collaborative ECM solution.
Additionally to content generation, SIDE provides useful server components to enhance some features of this release.

option.documentation: add share component to include custom iframe in pages
option.label: iframe integration

option.documentation:
This option enable Xform integration in Alfresco share.

  • Search forms can be accessible from advanced-search page
  • Results are displayed in documentlist components instead of share result list
  • Native advanced-search page is no longer accessible
  • Native open search displays results using documentlist too
  • Open search DO NOT WORK ANYMORE outside sites
option.label: XForms Integration

configurationParameter.documentation: Set this value to the URL of the Alfresco Share instance on which you want to generate and deploy
configurationParameter.label: Alfresco share URL

configurationParameter.documentation: The URL to reach facetMap web application (for exemple http://localhost:8080/facetmap)
configurationParameter.label: FacetMap URL

option.documentation: this option install a share extension that allow MS office user to edit document
option.label: edit content inline
